title: Should Trump, Congress update US nuclear strategy? We asked experts.
shortDescription: USA TODAY asked experts what changes our leaders can make to nuclear missile modernization to make the country a safer place.

title: Trump says oil companies could be 'reimbursed' for Venezuela spending
shortDescription: Trump told NBC in the Jan. 5 interview that the U.S. is not at war with Venezuela.

title: 'He's a good guy,' Trump says of Elon Musk after their Florida dinner
shortDescription: Elon Musk posted on social media that he had dinner with President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump at Mar-a-Lago as the men patched their feud

title: What was Biden’s stance on Maduro? Old tweet sparks debate.
shortDescription: An old tweet by former President Joe Biden has put focus on his administration's positions on Venezuela and it's now-deposed leader, Nicolas Maduro.

title: 1 in 3 Americans support Trump's military action against Maduro: Poll
shortDescription: One in three Americans supports the U.S. military action against Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.

title: Is Trump already becoming a lame-duck president?
shortDescription: With Congress passing just 61 laws last year, Trump’s influence may already be slipping heading into his second year in office.

title: 'We're in charge.' Trump doubles down on US position in Venezuela
shortDescription: President Donald Trump doubled down on his claim that the US is 'in charge' of Venezuela as questions swirl on the path forward after Maduro's arrest.

title: Lawmakers ready vote to avoid another government shutdown
shortDescription: Top lawmakers in Congress released three bipartisan spending bills to avoid another shutdown after Jan. 30.

title: Trump says Cuba is 'ready to fall,' threatens Colombian president
shortDescription: President Trump said Cuba is "ready to fall" and threatened U.S. military intervention in Colombia following the U.S. attack in Venezuela.
